short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Earth's mightiest heroes with this Avengers live wallpaper, featuring sleek design, dynamic visuals, and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
